track.name: Until My Dying Day
comments: i really love them since i was on elementary school, thanks for my uncle for that...
Favourite song by them. It speaks to me..

Hey Mr ali,Yuo've been outstanding over the past decades, mybe now its time to hear what you got on your own. Good luck on your solo career. You've already made History.

Alick Maere

This is of them tracks which exhibit uB40's versetality.This beat is a rare fusion of pop,raggae and soul music. Men i dig this track to the max!This group is in a hall of Legends without a doubt.Am A Neo-soul artist from Malawi and am down for unique creativity.We need reggae artists to be coming out with a unique touch of reggae.
